name: pruneboard
title: Pruneboard
description: Analyze and manage clipboard content by mimetype - prune unwanted formats to keep only what you need
author: jokull

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Clipboard Mimetypes
commands.subtitle: Analyze & Prune
commands.description: View all mimetypes in your clipboard and prune to a single format

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
